main_definition: Abu is a colloquial term used in various contexts, often referring to an elderly person or as a sign of respect.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Respectful address for an older man
meanings_and_examples.example: When speaking with my grandfather, I always call him 'Abu'.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Name of a notable figure or person
meanings_and_examples.example: Al-Afghani is known as Abu Abdullah. He was an influential Muslim thinker and philosopher.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Phrase used to express disbelief or surprise in some dialects of English
meanings_and_examples.example: When I heard that my friend won the lottery, I said 'Abu!'
